author: Dometi Pongo
title: The Coronavirus Disproportionately Affects Black Americans: Nikole Hannah-Jones On What You Need To Know
description: Investigative reporter Nikole Hannah-Jones talked with MTV News about the structural disadvantages plaguing Black communities, the role they’ve played in coronavirus mortality rates, and how people can lobby their representatives for meaningful action that wo…
content: Theres an old saying thats eerily appropriate in the wake of the novel coronavirus pandemic: If white America sneezes, Black America catches the flu. And as New York Times investigative journalist Nikole Hannah-Jones tells MTV News, It's almost never been mor… [+11735 chars]
